<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">3f67c27647717110274adeae536d434c</macroponent><name>select_1/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var codeSearchGrps = api.data.gliderecord_collection_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.sn_codesearch_search_group._results;
    console.log(codeSearchGrps);
    //._row_data.uniqueValue name.displayValue
    return codeSearchGrps.map((grp) => {
        {
            "id": grp._row_data.uniqueValue,
            "label": grp.name.displayValue
        }
    })
    //return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-14 07:21:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>960c42fa47717110274adeae536d43ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_1/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Explorer" source="x_13258_applicat_0">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application Explorer">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_960c42fa47717110274adeae536d43ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-14 07:25:08</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
